TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract Series

summary.span: 代表图表上的系列。

span.span: Represents a series in a chart.

para.span: 对象是集合的成员 。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Application As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Application { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 在不使用对象识别符的情况下使用时，此属性返回一个 代表 Microsoft Word 应用程序的对象。

span.span: When used without an object qualifier, this property returns an object that represents the Microsoft Word application.

summary.span: 如果与对象识别符一起使用，则此属性返回代表指定对象的创建者的 Application 对象（可以将此属性与 OLE 自动化对象一起使用以返回该对象的应用程序）。

span.span: When used with an object qualifier, this property returns an Application object that represents the creator of the specified object (you can use this property with an OLE Automation object to return the application of that object).

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

value.span: 应用程序（请参阅上面的）

span.span: Application (see above)

param.name: Type
param.span: 要应用的数据标签的类型。

span.span: The type of data label to apply.

param.name: LegendKey
param.span: True 显示图例项标示点旁。

span.span: True to show the legend key next to the point.
The default value is False.

param.name: AutoText
param.span: 如此 如果对象自动生成合适的文字内容。

span.span: True if the object automatically generates appropriate text based on content.

param.name: HasLeaderLines
param.span: 对于 和 对象，如果系列有引导线，则为 True 。

span.span: For the and objects, True if the series has leader lines.

param.name: ShowSeriesName
param.span: 传递布尔值以启用或禁用数据标签的系列名称。

span.span: Pass a boolean value to enable or disable the series name for the data label.

param.name: ShowCategoryName
param.span: 传递布尔值以启用或禁用数据标签的分类名称。

span.span: Pass a boolean value to enable or disable the category name for the data label.

param.name: ShowValue
param.span: 传递布尔值以启用或禁用数据标签的值。

span.span: Pass a boolean value to enable or disable the value for the data label.

param.name: ShowPercentage
param.span: 传递布尔值以启用或禁用数据标签的百分比。

span.span: Pass a boolean value to enable or disable the percentage for the data label.

param.name: ShowBubbleSize
param.span: 传递布尔值以启用或禁用数据标签的气泡大小。

span.span: Pass a boolean value to enable or disable the bubble size for the data label.
The separator for the data label.

summary.span: 返回或设置一个字符串，该字符串引用包含气泡图 x 值、y 值和大小数据的工作表单元格。

para.span: 在返回单元格引用时，它将返回以 A1 样式注释描述单元格的字符串。

para.span: 要为气泡图设置大小数据，必须使用 R1 样式注释。

span.span: To set the size data for the bubble chart, you must use R1C1-style notation.

summary.span: 如果系列具有图片填充，此方法将把图片复制到剪贴板。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Creator As Integer
public: property int Creator { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个 32 位整数，它指示在其中创建指定的对象的应用程序。

span.span: Returns a 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which the specified object was created.

summary.span: 只读 Integer。

span.span: Read-only Integer.

para.span: 如果对象是在 Microsoft Word 中创建的，则该 属性返回十六进制数字是4d535744，表示字符串 "MSWD"。

span.span: If the object was created in Microsoft Word, the property returns the hexadecimal number 4D535744, which represents the string "MSWD."

para.span: 此属性主要用于在 Macintosh 上，其中每个应用程序都有一个四字符创建者代码中使用。

span.span: This property was primarily designed to be used on the Macintosh, where each application has a four-character creator code.

para.span: 例如，Microsoft Word 提供了 MSWD 的创建者代码。

span.span: For example, Microsoft Word has the creator code MSWD.

para.span: 有关此属性的其他信息，请参阅语言参考 Microsoft Office Macintosh 版本所附带的帮助。

span.span: For additional information about this property, consult the language reference Help included with Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object DataLabels([in]object Index) runtime managed
Public Function DataLabels (Optional Index As Object) As Object

span.span: The number of the data label.

summary.span: 返回一个 object 类型的值，该值代表系列（集合）的单个数据标签（一个 对象）或所有数据标签的集合 。

span.span: Returns an object that represents either a single data label (a object) or a collection of all the data labels for the series (a collection).

returns.span: 一个Object代表系列的单个数据标签（一个 对象）或所有数据标签集合的对象（ 集合）。

span.span: An Object that represents either a single data label (a object) or a collection of all the data labels for the series (a collection).

para.span: 如果系列中指定数据标签的 "显示值" 选项处于打开状态，则返回的集合中每个数据点最多包含一个数据标签。

span.span: If the series has the Show Value option turned on for the data labels, the returned collection can contain up to one label for each point.

para.span: 可对系列中的各个数据点打开或关闭数据标签。

span.span: Data labels can be turned on or off for individual points in the series.

para.span: 如果指定系列处于面积图中，并且数据标签的 "显示标签" 选项处于打开状态，则返回的集合中仅包含单个数据标签，即面积系列的标签。

span.span: If the series is on an area chart and has the Show Label option turned on for the data labels, the returned collection contains only a single label, which is the label for the area series.

summary.span: 返回或设置饼图或圆环图切片的分解程度值。

span.span: Returns or sets the explosion value for a pie-chart or doughnut-chart slice.

span.span: Returns 0 (zero) if there's no explosion (the tip of the slice is in the center of the pie).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Formula { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Formula : string with get, set

summary.span: 返回或设置一个 String 值，它代表 A1 样式表示法和宏语言中的对象的公式。

span.span: Returns or sets a String value that represents the object's formula in A1-style notation and in the language of the macro.

para.span: 此属性对于 OLAP 数据源无效。

span.span: This property is not available for OLAP data sources.

para.span: 如果对象包含一个常量，则此属性返回该常量。

span.span: If the object contains a constant, this property returns the constant.

para.span: 如果对象为空，则此 属性返回一个空字符串。

span.span: If the object is empty, this property returns an empty string.

para.span: 如果对象包含公式，则该属性以字符串的形式返回公式，该 格式将显示在公式栏中（包括等号）。

span.span: If the object contains a formula, the property returns the formula as a string in the same format that would be displayed in the formula bar (including the equal sign).

para.span: 如果指定区域是一维或二维区域，则可将公式指定为 Visual Basic 中相同维数的数组。同样，也可在 Visual Basic 数组中使用公式。

span.span: If the range is a one- or two-dimensional range, you can set the formula to a Visual Basic array of the same dimensions. Similarly, you can put the formula into a Visual Basic array.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ FormulaLocal { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.FormulaLocal : string with get, set

summary.span: 返回或设置对象，在语言中的用户使用 A1-样式引用的公式。

span.span: Returns or sets the formula for the object, using A1-style references in the language of the user.

summary.span: 读/写 String。

span.span: Read/write String.

para.span: 如果单元格包含一个常量，此属性返回该常量。如果单元格为空，此属性返回一个空字符串。如果单元格包含公式，此属性将该公式作为字符串返回，所使用的格式与在公式栏中显示的格式相同（包括等号）。

span.span: If the cell contains a constant, this property returns that constant. If the cell is empty, the property returns an empty string. If the cell contains a formula, the property returns the formula as a string, in the same format in which it would be displayed in the formula bar (including the equal sign).

para.span: 如果将单元格的值或公式设置为日期，Microsoft Word 将检查该单元格是否已使用日期或时间数字格式之一进行了格式设置。

span.span: If you set the value or formula of a cell to a date, Microsoft Word checks to see whether that cell is already formatted with one of the date or time number formats.

para.span: 如果不是，数字格式将更改为默认的短日期数字格式。

span.span: If not, the number format is changed to the default short date number format.

para.span: 如果指定区域是一维或二维区域，则可将公式指定为 Visual Basic 中相同维数的数组。同样，也可在 Visual Basic 数组中使用公式。

span.span: If the range is a one- or two-dimensional range, you can set the formula to a Visual Basic array of the same dimensions. Similarly, you can put the formula into a Visual Basic array.

para.span: 对多重单元格区域设置公式，则该区域中所有单元格都用此公式填充。

span.span: Setting the formula of a multiple-cell range fills all cells in the range with the formula.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ FormulaR1C1 { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.FormulaR1C1 : string with get, set

summary.span: 返回或设置对象，用宏语言的 R1C1 样式表示法表示的公式。

span.span: Returns or sets the formula for the object, using R1C1-style notation in the language of the macro.

summary.span: 读/写 String。

span.span: Read/write String.

para.span: 如果单元格包含一个常量，此属性返回该常量。如果单元格为空，此属性返回一个空字符串。如果单元格包含公式，此属性将该公式作为字符串返回，所使用的格式与在公式栏中显示的格式相同（包括等号）。

span.span: If the cell contains a constant, this property returns the constant. If the cell is empty, the property returns an empty string. If the cell contains a formula, the property returns the formula as a string, in the same format in which it would be displayed in the formula bar (including the equal sign).

para.span: 如果将单元格的值或公式设置为日期，Microsoft Word 将检查该单元格是否已使用日期或时间数字格式之一进行了格式设置。

span.span: If you set the value or formula of a cell to a date, Microsoft Word checks to see whether that cell is already formatted with one of the date or time number formats.

para.span: 如果不是，数字格式将更改为默认的短日期数字格式。

span.span: If not, the number format is changed to the default short date number format.

para.span: 如果指定区域是一维或二维区域，则可将公式指定为 Visual Basic 中相同维数的数组。同样，也可在 Visual Basic 数组中使用公式。

span.span: If the range is a one- or two-dimensional range, you can set the formula to a Visual Basic array of the same dimensions. Similarly, you can put the formula into a Visual Basic array.

para.span: 对多重单元格区域设置公式，则该区域中所有单元格都用此公式填充。

span.span: Setting the formula of a multiple-cell range fills all cells in the range with the formula.

para.span: 如果单元格包含一个常量，此属性返回该常量。如果单元格为空，此属性返回一个空字符串。如果单元格包含公式，此属性将该公式作为字符串返回，所使用的格式与在公式栏中显示的格式相同（包括等号）。

span.span: If the cell contains a constant, this property returns that constant. If the cell is empty, the property returns an empty string. If the cell contains a formula, the property returns the formula as a string, in the same format in which it would be displayed in the formula bar (including the equal sign).

para.span: 如果将单元格的值或公式设置为日期，Microsoft Word 将检查该单元格是否已使用日期或时间数字格式之一进行了格式设置。

span.span: If you set the value or formula of a cell to a date, Microsoft Word checks to see whether that cell is already formatted with one of the date or time number formats.

para.span: 如果不是，数字格式将更改为默认的短日期数字格式。

span.span: If not, the number format is changed to the default short date number format.

para.span: 如果指定区域是一维或二维区域，则可将公式指定为 Visual Basic 中相同维数的数组。同样，也可在 Visual Basic 数组中使用公式。

span.span: If the range is a one- or two-dimensional range, you can set the formula to a Visual Basic array of the same dimensions. Similarly, you can put the formula into a Visual Basic array.

para.span: 对多重单元格区域设置公式，则该区域中所有单元格都用此公式填充。

span.span: Setting the formula of a multiple-cell range fills all cells in the range with the formula.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int InvertColor { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.InvertColor : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置系列中的负数据点的填充颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the fill color for negative data points in a series.

value.span: 系列中的负数据点的填充颜色。

span.span: The fill color for negative data points in a series.

para.span: 读/写。

span.span: Read/write.

para.span: 此属性将负数据点的填充颜色设置为特定的数值、十六进制、八进制或 RGB 颜色值。

span.span: This property sets the fill color for negative data points as a specific numeric, hexadecimal, octal, or RGB color value.

para.span: 您可以使用 属性，该属性使用当前调色板中的一组更加简单易行整数值，而不是使用此属性。

span.span: Instead of using this property, you can use the property, which uses a simplier set of integer values from the current color palette.

para.span: 若要使此属性生效，该 属性还必须设置为true。

span.span: For this property to have an effect, the property must also be set to true.

summary.span: 获取或设置系列中的负数据点的填充颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the fill color for negative data points in a series.

span.span: The fill color for negative data points in a series.

span.span: Read/write.

para.span: 此属性将负数据点的填充颜色设置为从零到56范围内的颜色索引值。

span.span: This property sets the fill color for negative data points as a color index value in the range from zero through 56.

para.span: 您可以使用 属性将颜色设置为特定的数值、十六进制、八进制或 RGB 颜色值，而不是使用此属性。

span.span: Instead of using this property, you can use the property, which sets the color as a specific numeric, hexadecimal, octal, or RGB color value.

span.span: If no leader lines are visible this example code will fail.

para.span: 在这种情况下，您可以手动将一个数据标签从饼图上拖离，以便显示出引导线。

span.span: In this situation, you can manually drag one of the data labels away from the pie chart to make a leader line show up.

member this.PlotOrder : int with get, set

summary.span: 返回或设置指定图表组中选定数据系列的绘制顺序。

span.span: Returns or sets the plot order for the selected series within the chart group.

summary.span: Integer 型，可读/写。

span.span: Read/write Integer.

para.span: 只能设置图表组内的绘制顺序（在图表中包含若干图表类型的情况下，不能设置整个图表的绘制顺序）。图表组指具有相同图表类型和子类型的数据系列的集合。

span.span: You can set plot order only within a chart group (you cannot set the plot order for the entire chart if you have more than one chart type). A chart group is a collection of series with the same chart type.

para.span: 更改某个系列的绘制顺序将导致同一图表组内其他数据系列的绘制顺序的必要调整。

span.span: Changing the plot order of one series will cause the plot orders of the other series in the chart group to be adjusted, as necessary.
